author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: شاید آنانکه در خوابند بیدار شوند بگو ای مردگان دست بخشش یزدانی آب زندگانی میدهد بشتابید و بنوشید هر که امروز زنده شد هرگز نمیرد و هر که امروز مرد هرگز زندگی نیابد...
translation: Incline your ears to the sweet melody of this Prisoner. Arise, and lift up your voices, that haply they that are fast asleep may be awakened. Say: O ye who are as dead! The Hand of Divine bounty proffereth unto you the Water of Life. Hasten and drink your fill. Whoso hath been reborn in this Day, shall never die; whoso remaineth dead, shall never live.
